directions.step:
Parboil yams in skins or use left-overs. Peel; slice in rounds about 1/8-inch thick. Melt fat in large skillet. Brown slices quickly on both sides. Turn off fire; add butter; sprinkle with sugar. Serve with bacon curls and spiced crabapples.
NOTES : This booklet was prepared by the Louisiana Sweet Potato Commission.
Recipe by: 75 Easy Yam Recipes with a Romantic Past
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #837 by NGavlak@aol.com on Oct 11, 1997
